main event: On 3 December 1948, a bright white round object was sighted by weather observers at Chanute Air Force Base, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be moving at over 350 MPH while heading from northeast to south southwest., It was seen to be approximately 15 feet long and 6 feet wide, resembling a jet fighter in size., The object traversed 35 degrees of the horizon in about 2-3 seconds before disappearing., Multiple reports were filed without any physical evidence being obtained., Witnesses stated there was no sound associated with the object.
witness description: weather observers from the 16th Weather Squadron at Chanute Air Force Base
